skills.name: Identify a sequence of transformations that produce congruent shapes (US)

explanations.A: The reflection does not change the length of the line, and neither does the translation. Therefore the line remains 3 units long.
explanations.B: I think you have multiplied the length of the line by the horizontal part of the translation, perhaps because it is a horizontal line. To see what happens to the line's length, try reflecting it and then translating it.
explanations.C: I think you have added the length of the line to the horizontal part of the translation, perhaps because it is a horizontal line. Try completing the reflection and translation for the line to see what happens to the length.
explanations.D: I think you have added the length of the line to the distances in the translation. Try completing the reflection and translation for the line to see what happens to the length.

explanations.A: I think you believe a translation changes the length of the line. Try drawing out a line and carry out a translation, does the length of the line change?
explanations.B: I think you believe a reflection changes the length of the line. Try drawing out a line and carry out a reflection, does the length of the line change?
explanations.C: I think you believe a rotation changes the length of the line. Try drawing out a line and carry out a rotation, does the length of the line change?
explanations.D: A reflection, rotation and translation do not change the length of a line, and neither would any combination of these.
